wynn-war-cooldown.config.title: Wynn War Cooldown Configuration
wynn-war-cooldown.config.hud_scale.toolt: Scale the timer size (0.1 = smaller, 5.0 = larger)
wynn-war-cooldown.config.offset.tooltip: Adjust when the timer ends relative to the cooldown. Positive = later, Negative = earlier. Default set to 1 second to account for any server lag.
wynn-war-cooldown.config.sound_offset.to: When to play sound relative to timer end. Positive = after, Negative = before
How long to show timers after they expire. 0 = hide immediately, 60 = show for 1 minute
wynn-war-cooldown.config.remove_on_queue: Remove timer when territory is queued (defense status appears in chat)
wynn-war-cooldown.config.send_guild_atta: When enabled, the mod will send /guild attack when a cooldown ends.
wynn-war-cooldown.config.sound_type.tool: Choose which sound to play when the timer ends
wynn-war-cooldown.config.text_color.tool: Choose the color for the timer text
wynn-war-cooldown.config.expired_text_co: Choose the color for timers that finished their cooldown
